tool_description: Build beautiful mobile commerce apps. Leave the heavy lifting to us.
name: MobStac
title: MobStac

api_list.name: Get products by category
api_list.description: Returns a JSON encoded list of products belonging to the given category id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mobstac-MobStac-v1.p.rapidapi.com/organizations/368/namespaces/336/categories/336-58ac6dba1c9b4046b7593f151a1b9530/products/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mobstac-MobStac-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get the shopping cart state
api_list.description: Returns an associative array with product ids as keys and their quantities as values. Requires setting the HTTP Authorization header for uniquely identifying the customer. Read the docs for further details
api_list.code:

api_list.name: Get a product
api_list.description: Returns a JSON encoded array of product attributes. Product ID needs to be passed in the request URL.

api_list.name: Get all apps
api_list.description: Returns a JSON encoded array of apps linked to organization id, org_id and namespace id, ns_id

api_list.name: Get single app with app id, app_id
api_list.description: Returns a JSON encoded list of attributes linked to app id, app_id
